title: Baldur's Gate 3 Impressions - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Greg, Blessing, and Andy give their thoughts on their first 10 hours with Baldur's Gate 3.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto

Buy Some Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store
